attributes.action: Abandon Plans to Sell Off the Dartford Crossing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Dartford Crossing tolls are a regular cause of tail-backs on the M25, delaying travellers and creating excess pollution from miles of slow-moving traffic.

Selling off the crossing will mean that this counter-productive blockage will remain in perpetuity and block any chance of redeeming the situation by removing the tolls.
